## Description

project a point onto a plane


## Usage

```r
projection_fun(point_to_project, plane_point, plane_norm)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`point_to_project`     |     point_to_project
`plane_point`     |     plane_point
`plane_norm`     |     plane_norm
